basic.description: The fundamentals of digital systems. Boolean algebra applied to digital systems; logic gates and combinational logic design; arithmetic circuits; flip-flops, registers and counters; synchronous sequential logic and state machine design; structure of ROM, RAM, PLA's and PLD's.
basic.subject: ELEC
basic.title: Digital Systems

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite of APSC171 and APSC172 and APSC174 and registered in a BSCE Academic Program.
